speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I wish to recognize Kim Larson for receiving the Supporter of the Year Award from the South Dakota Habitat for Humanity. This is a prestigious award that reflects her hard work and dedication to eliminating poverty around the world. It is also a reflection of the valuable role she has played in giving back to her local community.

Kim Larson with Oahe Habitat for Humanity is Executive Assistant for the CEO of BankWest in Pierre where she is instrumental in providing servicing on loans and facilitating the documentation for the partner families. Always available, Kim is able to keep Oahe Habitat representatives and the partner families informed. Kim has proven to be an integral part of the Oahe affiliate of Habitat for Humanity.
It gives me great pleasure to recognize Kim Larson and to congratulate her on receiving this well-earned award and wish her continued success in the years to come.
